text: Mbe maaŋ ana suaŋgiap, mbe zumgum mpiiŋ ndigap, ana kegap, ana ndigap, mbe won guman pana vhari Pairat farve khɨngi. 27.2 Pairat ana Rom guma ma. Mbe Romiŋ ana ndi fagim, ana Zuda gari guman pana vhari ki. Mbe Zudaiŋ, mbe nduarira Zisas shogirim, ana rimgirga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Mbe Romiŋ suanga, mbe guma the shogirim, ana rɨmɨnga. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, mbe Zudaiŋ Zisas ndigap Pairat han vui. Ndu Zon sapta 18 gu sapta 31 ganɨri.
